volt-mx-ls-toolkit.name: volt-mx-ls-toolkit
volt-mx-ls-toolkit.description: Toolkit to enable better integration between HCL Software products HCL Volt MX and HCL Domino. This is LotusScript toolkit for running HCL Domino agents as REST services, with specific helpers for JSON in-out and a specific payload recommended for HCL Volt MX
